Course

The home page of the undergraduate course "Data Science Applied to Football", in Portuguese "Ciência de Dados Aplicada ao Futebol", which we first offered in the first semester of 2023 at UFMG for students majoring in Computer Science, Information Systems and Computational Mathematics.
